author: Al Jazeera
title: India's toaster-sized ventilator to help in fight against virus
description: The portable machine, which is cheaper and easy to install, can be useful amid shortage of conventional ventilators.
content:
Originally created by a robot scientist and a neurosurgeon to help India's poor, a toaster-sized ventilator is offering hope in the country's fight against the coronavirus pandemic, and demand for it is booming.
The virus, at its most lethal, attacks the lun… [+3209 chars]
